content:
I'm calculating how many times we met today.

One plus two plus one equals... five?

{短暂停}Why was I calculating this again?

Where should Mors stay when he arrives?
Maybe I should prepare him some...
A fossil mattress? (laughs)
For a research scholar, no one can resist a fossil bed... I suppose. *smiles*

Mors was quite well-known in the Academia,
I remember seeing him rushing down the hallways,
always carrying piles of fossils and reference guides.
